sentences.sContent: They have been bartering wheat for cotton and timber.
sentences.sCn: 他们一直在用小麦交换棉花和木材。

synos.tran: 进行易货贸易；[贸易]作物物交换；讨价还价
易货贸易；[贸易]物物交换；实物交易

trans.tranCn: 进行易货贸易；[贸易] 作物物交换；讨价还价
trans.tranOther: to exchange goods, work, or services for other goods or services rather than for money

trans.tranCn: 易货贸易；物物交换；实物交易
trans.tranOther: a system of exchanging goods and services for other goods and services rather than using money
